tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct userExperienceScore,count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where ${milestoneGoal} and stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct browserFamily,count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where ${milestoneGoal} and browserFamily IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct stringProperties.paymenttype as "Payment Type",CONDITION(COUNT(*), WHERE userExperienceScore="SATISFIED") as "Satisfied Count",CONDITION(COUNT(*), WHERE userExperienceScore="TOLERATED") as "Tolerated Count",CONDITION(COUNT(*), WHERE userExperienceScore="FRUSTRATED") as "Frustrated Count",count(*) as "Total Count" FROM usersession where ${milestoneGoal} and stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct DATETIME(starttime,"yyy-MM-dd HH:mm","5m") as "Start Time", usersession.stringProperties.paymenttype,CONDITION(count(*), where usersession.stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL) as "Count" FROM useraction where usersession.stringProperties.paymenttype IS NOT NULL
